text:
Shure.
I have a file where I have my macros, and in that file I added some inline logic which in the end is added to a var which I then use when importing that file.

Im trying to hide/show modules on a few system pages depending on the value of a query parameter in the URL - and for whatever reason it doesn't appear to work as anticipated. Is there a reason? The query parameter would be appended to the url for the unsubscribe/subscription preferences link(s) in an email template
